entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Animation on Opacity Issue #16729
  • Date format error for September #16728
  • WebView does not support setPointerCapture when mouse leaves the control #16727
  • Context menu not displaying on Mac Catalyst with BlazorWebView #16726
  • Binding OnIdiom inside IsVisible causes crash in release mode #16725
  • RadioButton initialisation makes multiple groups unusable #16724
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Binding Issue: Multiple platform - Binding a property after an animation fails #16723
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Binding Issue: Multiple platform Label control - Multiple properties #16722
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Binding Issue: Multiple platform CheckBox control 'IsChecked' #16721
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Binding Issue: Multiple platform Slider control 'Value' #16720

Closed

  • NavigationPage - InsertPageBefore forces visibility of the NavigationBar #6936
    Backlog
  • [Windows] CollectionView cut off #7326
    Backlog
  • [Android] Soft Input Resize doesn't properly resize #7369
    Backlog
  • Attempting to run on iOS device gets doesn't have a target for 'net6.0-ios/ios-arm64' error #8272
    Backlog
  • Switching the MAUI Controls Gallery to RTL causes the currently visible view to not resize correctly #9702
    Backlog
  • Maui Application running throws FileNotFoundException (iOS) #10821
    Backlog
  • [regression/7.0.81] label created dynamically in code doesn't stretch like it should #14588
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Image with FontImageSource shows nothing after switching between the applications #15669
    .NET 8
  • [MAUI with .NET 8] Can't run on Android/iOS #15849
  • Maui - SwipeView not working with Editor control in iOS #15975
    Backlog
  • iOS - CollectionView incorrect behaviors #15977
  • "playsinline" attribute not working in HTML5 video tag for iOS #16013
  • DatePicker runtime error during DateSelected event #16022

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update WebNavigationResult.cs doc comments #16710
    area/docs 📓, t/docs 📝, backport/suggested

Updated

  • [UITest] Add more logging and restart in setup #16687
    area/testing
  • Make Android visual test screenshots more deterministic #16591
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16690
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
